meanings.definition: Give facts or information to someone
meanings.sent1: I will inform you about the weather forecast.
meanings.sent2: Please inform me if you need any help with your homework.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot can inform visitors about the zoo animals.
meanings.sent4: The map will inform you of the best route to take.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide will inform tourists about the historical landmarks.
